info.title: Billing Document Request - Read, Reject, Delete
info.description: Consumers of this inbound service can read, reject, and delete billing document requests inside your system by sending OData requests. The service makes billing document request data available through its header, item, business partner, and pricing element entities.

x-sap-shortText: Read, reject, and delete billing document requests in your system by using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Sales Order Processing - Project-Based Services(J14)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/J14 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Sales: Billing Document (SD_BILLINGDOC)
* Sales: Billing Document Item (SD_BILLINGDOCITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Reads item business partners for all billing documents.
get.description: Reads business partner data from the items of all billing documents in the system. This includes fields such as partner function, customer, contact person, and more.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads item business partners of an item and with a specific partner function in a specific billing document.
get.description: Reads item-level business partners with a specific partner function of a specific billing document. Consumers must specify the billing document number, billing document item, and partner function.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the billing document header for a specific item and item partner function.
get.description: Reads billing document header fields for a specific item and item-level partner function. Includes fields such as the document number, billing date, total amount, billing type, and more. Consumers must pass the following key fields: billing document number, item number, and item-level  partner function.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads a billing document item for a specific item partner function.
get.description: Reads billing document item fields for a specific item-level partner function. Includes fields such as the item number, billing quantity, product, net amount, and more. Consumers must pass the following key fields: billing document number, item number, and item partner function.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads item pricing elements of all billing document requests.
get.description: Reads pricing element data from the items of all billing document requests in the system. Includes fields such as condition type, condition currency, condition quantity, and more.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the item pricing elements for a specific item and item pricing element.
get.description: Reads pricing element data from a specific item and for a specific item pricing element. Includes fields such as condition type, condition currency, condition quantity, and more. Consumers must pass the following key fields: billing document number, item number pricing procedure step, and pricing procedure counter.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the billing document request header for a specific item and item pricing element.
get.description: Reads the billing document request header fields for a specific item and item pricing element. Includes fields such as the document number, billing date, total amount, billing type, and more. Consumers must pass the following key fields: billing document request number, item number, pricing procedure step, and pricing procedure counter.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads a billing document request item for a specific item and item-level pricing element.
get.description: Reads billing document request item fields for a specific item and item-level pricing element. Includes fields such as the item number, billing quantity, product, net amount, and more. Consumers must pass the following key fields: billing document request number, item number, pricing procedure step, and pricing procedure counter.

get.summary: Reads the header of a specific billing document request.
get.description: Reads the header fields of a specific billing document request, which the consumer specifies by passing the billing document request number.  Includes fields such as the document number, billing date, total amount, billing type, and more.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

delete.summary: Deletes one specific billing document request.
delete.description: Deletes one specific billing document request in the system, which the consumer specifies by passing the billing document request number. To delete multiple billing document requests simultaneously, use a batch request.

get.summary: Reads all items of a specific billing document request.
get.description: Reads all item fields of a specific billing document request, which the consumer specifies by passing the billing document request number. Includes fields such as the item number, billing quantity, product, net amount, and more.

get.summary: Reads a specific billing document request item.
get.description: Reads the data of a specific billing document request item, which the consumer specifies by passing the billing document request number and item number. Includes fields such as the shipping point, billing quantity, product, net amount, and more.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the billing document request header for a specific item.
get.description: Reads the billing document request header fields for a specific item. Includes fields such as the document number, billing date, total amount, billing type, and more.  Consumers must pass the following key fields: billing document request number, item number.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the item pricing elements of a specific billing document request item.
get.description: Reads pricing element data from a specific item of a specific billing document request. The consumer must specify the billing document request number and item number. Includes fields such as condition type, condition currency, condition quantity, and more.

parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

post.summary: Rejects one specific billing document request.
post.description: Rejects one specific billing document request in the system, which the consumer specifies by passing the billing document request number. The status of the billing document will change to "Rejected". To reject multiple billing document requests simultaneously, use a batch request.

parameters.name: BillingDocumentRequest
parameters.description: Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_BillingDocReqItemPartner HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: Skip the first n items, see [Paging - Skip](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)
